entries.text: This is SkyHigh Airlines. Can I have your booking reference please?
It's JK45L2. I need to change my flight, it's ridiculous that they cancelled my original flight without any notice!
Okay, let me take a look... Yes, I see your flight was cancelled due to unforeseen operational reasons. I understand this is frustrating. What would you like to do?
Unforeseen? It's a sunny day! Look, I need to be in Chicago by tomorrow afternoon, what are my options?
Sir, I understand your frustration.  We have a flight leaving this evening at 8 PM with a few seats left, or there's a flight tomorrow morning at 6 AM.
8 PM is too late! That's ridiculous. Fine, 6 AM it is. But I am not happy about this.
Alright, I've rebooked you on the 6 AM flight. Do you have any baggage to check in?
Okay, all set. You'll receive an updated itinerary via email. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
